subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Kristin's Files/Grab my coffee GO GET ok YOUR COFFEE.wav 
  Uploaded by : nitsirk65 <ckmorris95@...> 
  Description : It was turning into a long session and I needed my coffee. I mentioned to them that I needed hem to hold on a second while I grabbed my coffee and they said GO GET YOUR COFFEE. I heard Go get and was off but on review I heard the YOUR COFFEE part. 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Kristin%27s%20Files/Grab%20my%20coffee%20GO%20GET%20ok%20YOUR%20COFFEE.wav 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

nitsirk65 <ckmorris95@...>
